char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why did that idiot not shut the heck up?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've spent all day trying to find the source of this problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She's gonna pay for this disgrace.
Who you talking to?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You, obviously. For what some have said, this is unacceptable.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why is that? This spell is meant to be a blessing!

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This spell will be finished by me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Heh. Good luck trying to turn it off.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This will only end once I go insane and beat you to a pulp.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Only a ballroom would be the place for a battle. This room is too small for such a battle!

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I see, but this has to stop.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You can just back off.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Sorry, but I can't leave.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: From what your daughter told me, I can only be the most beautiful woman in the Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You spoke too soon. I am now the most beautiful woman in Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You will lose the beauty. Afterward, I will reclaim the title.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you don't turn off the spell, you're screwed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if you defeat me, you won't wait to see the effects.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How much longer are you going to keep the spell on?

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Indefinitely.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You're more annoying than Flandre Scarlet!

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are you saying I sell my soul to the Scarlet Devil? No way!

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You will be locked away in this room until your husband comes to rescue you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Oh, this is going to be a long and fun night.
